volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: University of Science and Technology, Tehran, Iran

publications.name: The Art of Shonen Storytelling: A Software Developer's Perspective
publications.summary: This publication draws parallels between the compelling arcs of shonen anime and agile software development cycles, providing a unique approach to storytelling in application design.

publications.name: Leveling Up: Combining Fitness Training with Gamification Inspired by Anime
publications.summary: An analysis of how gamification inspired by anime tropes can motivate gym-goers to achieve their fitness goals while enjoying an immersive experience.

publications.name: Building Full-Stack Applications with an Anime Twist
publications.summary: A practical guide to designing software applications with UI/UX elements inspired by anime aesthetics, making tech more engaging for anime enthusiasts.
